trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Yadkinville
There were no other sightings in Yadkinville on or around May 27th 2012
Summary: star like object moving with no sound, changed colors twice.
divs: Sighting Detailsoutside with a friend and noticed a star like object moving the speed of a plane. it had no blinking lights and no sound. it then turned into a bright blue light then back to its original star like color and kept at a steady speed as it gradually ascended out of sight but before it lost visibility it then turned to a bright yellow light. then, gone. totally blew our minds.
